activities: Sprout Social provides social media management software for businesses and individuals. As such, Sprout Social may receive personally identifiable information such as names, email addresses, phone numbers, or social media account information from users of the Service. Sprout Social also collects non-personally identifiable information from browser sessions such as browser type and operating system as well as potentially personally identifiable information such as IP addresses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Dispute resolution shall be handled by the BBB EU Safe Harbor program.
